No. 261783)} Sub: Addendum to Standard Operating Procedure (SOP): Foundation Stone Laying/ Inauguration of National Highways Projects by Hon'ble Prime Minister reg: Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) for Foundation Stone Laying/ Inauguration of National Highways Projects by Hon 'ble Prime Minister was issued vide NHAI Policy Circular No. 4.28/2023 dated O5th April, 2023. Subsequent, an addendum for the same was issued vide NHAI Policy Circular No. 4.30/2023 dated 31st October, 2023. 2 Based on the recent   experience and lessons learnt   during the recent Events of Inaugurations/ Foundation Stone Laying, some additional guidelines have been added in the addendum issued vide NHAI Policy Circular No. 4.30/2023 dated 31.10.2023 (In supersession of aforementioned addendum) to the existing guidelines is enclosed (Annexure -I) herewith for compliance by all concerned: 3_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
